overall_theme: August 2025 is a transitional month where long-term geopolitical cycles (84-year global wars, 45-year Iran, 250-year empires) opened in July continue to build. The concentrated volatility window is Aug 13-18 where S&P and Gold daily cycles converge. Seasonal bias is negative for S&P/EUR/USD and Bitcoin, positive for Gold and Oil. September approaches as statistically the worst month for equities.

2025-08-13-18: S&P500 (CONCENTRATED VOLATILITY WINDOW - S&P and Gold daily cycles converge)
2025-08-15: S&P500 (stat: 73% up, strongest date in window)
2025-08-28: Oil (turning point, stat: 73% up, decade pattern peak)

sp500.bias: Slightly negative seasonally. September worst month approaching.
sp500.critical_window: Aug 13-18 (dense S&P and Gold daily cycle convergence)
top_insights: RSP and Dow not breaking highs - narrow mega-cap rally
MACD negative divergence persisting on weekly chart
Below 5,961 at month end = fundamental change
sp500.summary: Five turning points with concentrated volatility Aug 13-18. Trend positive but participation weakening. MACD divergence present.

bitcoin.bias: Bearish seasonally (66.7% negative Augusts in 15-year history)
top_insights: MACD/RSI negative divergence on weekly - momentum weakening
Volume not expanding despite price rise
Large holders reducing supply could override bearish technicals
bitcoin.summary: Bearish seasonality with MACD/RSI divergence. ATH breakout quality uncertain. Aug 10-22 window strongly bearish historically.

eurusd.bias: Bearish seasonally. Two monthly + two weekly cycles support decline.
top_insights: Weekly cycles ending Aug 8/22 are key turning points
eurusd.summary: Bearish with strong statistical support for decline. 80% down probability on Aug 29. Support at 1.1576-1.1625 critical.

gold.bias: Positive (bullish) seasonally. August favorable for Gold.
top_insights: ATH zone - precise top hard to estimate
Fib 38.2% at $3,134 held in May bounce
Inverted N on weekly = deepest decline in 2.5 years
gold.summary: Bullish seasonal bias but at ATH in Elliott Wave 5. Mixed stats with both up and down probabilities. Support $3,250/$3,134 critical.

oil.bias: Positive (bullish) seasonally. August favorable for Oil.
top_insights: Two decade patterns point to August highs around Aug 28-31
Weekly cycles ending Aug 22/29 could create sharp moves
oil.summary: Bullish seasonal bias. Trapped in range. Decade patterns suggest peak Aug 28-31 then possible reversal. Above $80 = trend change.

cross_asset_themes: Aug 1 is a turning point for S&P500, EUR/USD, and Oil simultaneously - expect cross-market movement
Aug 13-18 is the critical volatility window with S&P and Gold daily cycles converging
Aug 28 clusters turning points for S&P500 and Oil with strong statistical backing (68-73% up)
Geopolitical catalysts: 84-year wars cycle, 45-year Iran cycle, 250-year empires cycle all active from July
90/144-year identity/migration cycles adding geopolitical pressure through currencies, gold, crypto
Seasonal bias split: bearish for equities/EUR/Bitcoin, bullish for Gold and Oil
September approaching as worst month for equities - August positioning critical
risk_management_rules: Tighten stops on all existing positions
Avoid new long positions without clear correction first
Avoid leveraged ETF positions during volatile windows
Oil: NO open positions over weekends
Short trades require dual confirmation from turning point date AND chart
All dates may deviate +/- 1 trading day
Do not act automatically on dates - wait for price confirmation
Below S&P 5,961 at month end = fundamental change signal
Maintain vigilance through defense, energy, gold, and currency sectors
